instruction: Summarize the following text about dogs in 3-4 sentences.
input: Dogs have roamed the Earth for thousands of years, from their initial domestication from wolves. They are known for their loyalty, companionship, and intelligence. As time has passed, dogs have become increasingly popular, from serving as loyal guards to simple companions.
output: Dogs are one of the oldest domesticated animals, having been bred from wolves for thousands of years. They are known for their loyalty, intelligence, and companionship towards humans. As a result, they have become a popular pet, guardian, and companion throughout human history. Dogs are seen as an integral part of many cultures and continue to be the most beloved animals around the world today.
